TopicTitle: One small post for man, one giant leap for kerbalkind

Articles.Content: Hi everybody! As a long time lurker, about a year now, IÃ‚Â´m not used to posting, and I prefer having something to say when I do. So when I figured I would share my replica jet fighter I was not pleased to find out that I canÃ‚Â´t attach images until I have left the Curious George phase... So I better get started!

Hello! Are you trying to use the forum attachment system? Because this doesn't work. You are going to have to use a free image hosting site like imgur and upload the images to there, then copy the BB code to a forum post.
Oh... I thought that was attachments. Thanks for pointing that out!

Most sites do allow attachments but have major restrictions on image size. This one, as you found out, doesn't. Therefore, you need to use a hosting site to link the photos. It's time that I will be joining one soon.
